text: Randol is a village situated in Muzaffarabad Block Saharanpur district of Uttar Pradesh state, India. It is about 17.7 km from Saharanpur city and 24.3 km from Sarsawa. Randol has a population of 6,500 with 1,200 households as per a report released by UCO bank. == References == Category:Villages in Uttar Pradesh
title: Randol
